<u>Representing the joint of two hydrants <\u>
<u>A.a<\u> first hydrant, <u>b<\u> second hydrant, with 
its basal tentacles <u>c, c. B<\u> Two hydrants 
growing together, <u>a<\u> and <u>b<\u> the same as at 
preceding <s>figure<\s> sketch, <u>c<\u> the basal tentacles on 
radial canal jointed together at top.
<u>C<\u> and <u>D<\u> two degree of development 
of annular canal from the joint of 
four radial canal for tentacles of inte 
rior hydrant):- both gydranths are 
represented from the side of its tops.
